art.title: Portrait 1
art.desc: A portrait from my collection of works inspired by Disco Elysium.

art.title: A Stapler on Tablecloth and a Box
Wygodnie
art.desc: Graphite on bristol, B2 - A shot from the movie 'Camouflage'.

art.title: A Goofy Cartoon Character
art.desc: I also like drawing cartoon characters. This one's fishy.

art.title: Salesman from BabushCats
art.desc: Concept/promo art for a character in BabushCats - a game I'm helping to develop.

gamedev.title: Hellwaste
gamedev.desc: My solo game project - a bullet-hell, 2D, pixelart, exploration shooter where your choices matter. Developed in Godot Engine and covered on my YouTube channel. Everything from code and design to art and effects (except sound effects) was made by me.

gamedev.title: My most recent devlog of Hellwaste
gamedev.desc: Every video is its own little project.

gamedev.title: Combat Gameplay
gamedev.desc: Player can use weapons, abilities and the environment to fight enemies.

gamedev.title: Boss Fight 1
gamedev.desc: Slow tanky boss featuring chain-themed attacks.

gamedev.title: Boss Fight 2
gamedev.desc: An optional secret harder boss. It's only hinted at throughout the game world.

gamedev.title: Item System
gamedev.desc: Player can collect items used as special abilities or for quests.

gamedev.title: BabushCats
gamedev.desc: Our current project at Deez Games. I'm in charge of art, visual effects and coding.

gamedev.title: Minigame UI Animations and Effects
gamedev.desc: Examples of me making the game's UI feel good and more lively.

gamedev.title: Death Animation
gamedev.desc: Or rather get-sucked-out-of-your-cat's-dream animation. Made with Unity Shader Graph.

gamedev.title: Boss Attack Effects
gamedev.desc: I do vibe with the fish getting cartoonishly stuck in the ground.

gamedev.title: Other Games
gamedev.desc: Here are some things I did on other projects at Deez Games.

gamedev.title: Skewered!
gamedev.desc: On this project I was responsible for VFX, animations and a bit of coding. In this mobile game you try to skewer as many ingredients as possible and to get crazy combos!

gamedev.title: Party Prison
gamedev.desc: Here, once again, I made the VFX and UI animations for such things as the GUI, slapping, running dust, water filling and spilling. The game is a quite goofy party game in which players need to collaborate are compete against each other to escape from prison!
